    • Uses of Item in eftaios.model.decks

      Methods in eftaios.model.decks that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item ItemDeck.drawItem()
      Function that returns an item If the itemDeck doesn't exists it creates one by calling the createDeck method If it's not empty, it removes the first of the stack (LIFO) else the itemDeck is empty, it's filled with discarded cards and then first one is removed
      Methods in eftaios.model.decks with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ItemDeck.discardItem(Item item)
      Function that discards an Item by putting it into the discardedItems array and shuffles it
